page.title: 15Industries
page.content: Apart from the AA, there is no large employer in the block. A firm in Wid- merpool named "Stikies" makes plastic stickers to order. A light engineering firm based on Manor Farm does welding of farm gates, etc. A large nursery supplies plants to the trade, and there is a joinery on the Old Hall Estate. In Wysall there is a builder (member of an old village family) who does most of the local house buil- ding. There is also a garage that does repairs of motor vehicles and machin- ery. On Thurlby Lane (N.E. corner of block) there is a rose grower. Many residents travel to work in towns or cities such as Nottingham, Loughborough and Leicester.
